TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CacheItemPolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示指定缓存项的一组逐出和过期详细信息。

span.span: Represents a set of eviction and expiration details for a specific cache entry.

para.span: 该 类型是未密封的，以便自定义缓存开发人员可以对其进行扩展。

span.span: The type is unsealed so that custom cache developers can extend it.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在指定的时间点逐出缓存项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cache entry should be evicted at a specified point in time.
The point in time at which a cache entry is evicted.

value.span: 默认值为 ，这意味着该项未过期。

span.span: The default value is , meaning that the entry does not expire.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChangeMonitors As Collection(Of ChangeMonitor)

summary.span: 获取与某个缓存项关联的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that are associated with a cache entry.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以添加或删除与某个缓存项关联的更改监视器。You can add to or remove change monitors that are associated with a cache entry. 但是，必须先完成更改监视器集，然后才能将实例传递 到 实现。However, the set of change monitors must be complete before you pass a instance to an implementation. 如果在 对象传递到实现后更改对象的更改监视器集 ，则这些更改不起作用。If you change the set of change monitors on a object after the object has been passed to an implementation, the changes have no effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于确定是否逐出某个缓存项的优先级别设置。

span.span: Gets or sets a priority setting that is used to determine whether to evict a cache entry.

value.span: 用于指示逐出的优先级别的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the priority for eviction.

value.span: 默认的优先级别值为 ，这表示无优先级别。

span.span: The default priority value is , which means no priority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 中，优先级枚举仅具有两个可能的优先级： (这意味着没有优先级) ， (这意味着不能) 删除该项。In ASP.NET, the priority enumeration only has two possible priorities: (which means no priority), and (which means the entry cannot be removed). 因此，可以设置的唯一优先级是缓存项是否应始终保留在缓存中。Therefore, the only priority that can be set is whether a cache entry should remain in the cache forever. > [!IMPORTANT] > 向缓存中添加具有优先级级别的项 可能导致缓存溢出，并导致无法删除的项。Adding an entry to the cache with a priority level of can cause the cache to overflow with entries that can never be removed. 仅当缓存实现提供了从缓存中逐出条目以及管理缓存条目数的方式时，缓存实现才应为缓存条目设置优先级。Cache implementations should set the priority for a cache entry only if the cache implementation provides ways to evict entries from the cache and to manage the number of cache entries.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Runtime::Caching::CacheEntryRemovedCallback ^ RemovedCallback { System::Runtime::Caching::CacheEntryRemovedCallback ^ get(); void set(System::Runtime::Caching::CacheEntryRemovedCallback ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对 委托的引用，在从缓存中移除某个项后将调用该委托。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to a delegate that is called after an entry is removed from the cache.

value.span: 对由缓存实现调用的委托的引用。

span.span: A reference to a delegate that is called by a cache implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在从缓存中移除某个缓存项后，该缓存将调用由该属性引用的回调对象 。After a cache entry has been removed from the cache, the cache invokes the callback object that is referenced by the property. 缓存实现可以使用此回调通知调用方法缓存项已被移除。A cache implementation can use this callback to notify the calling method that a cache entry has been removed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果某个缓存项在给定时段内未被访问，是否应被逐出。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cache entry should be evicted if it has not been accessed in a given span of time.

value.span: 一个时段，必须在此时段内访问某个缓存项，否则将从内存中逐出该缓存项。

span.span: A span of time within which a cache entry must be accessed before the cache entry is evicted from the cache.

value.span: 默认值为 ，这意味着该项的过期不应该基于时间跨度。

span.span: The default is , meaning that the item should not be expired based on a time span.

summary.span: 获取或设置对 委托的引用，在从缓存中移除某个缓存项之前将调用该委托。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to a delegate that is called before a cache entry is removed from the cache.

value.span: 对由缓存实现调用的委托的引用。

span.span: A reference to a delegate that is called by a cache implementation.
